Spells-Divine -- Female Versatile Human Cleric: 10
Strength: +3 Dexterity: +2 Constitution: +4 Intelligence: +2 Wisdom: +3 Charisma: +3
Background: Field Medic Deity: Gozreh
Experience: 9937/10000 Level: 10 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Hardy Traveler: +1 Encumbered Bulk/+1 Maximum Bulk
Hardy Traveler: +10' Speed during overland travel
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 3; Class: 5; General: 3; Skill: 5 Selectable Feature Count: Cleric (Doctrine); Human (Heritage)
Feats: Additional Lore (Dragon Lore); Adopted Ancestry (Tripkee); Assurance (Religion); Canny Acumen (Perception); Cremate Undead; Divine Rebuttal; Domain Initiate (Nature); Group Aid; Hardy Traveler; Martyr; Replenishment Of War; Skill Training (Hunting Lore); Skill Training (Military Lore); Student Of The Canon; Terrain Expertise (Arctic); Unconventional Weaponry (Hatchet) Cleric Features: Attack Trained (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attribute Boost (Wisdom); Attribute Boosts; Class Trained (Cleric); Cleric Feats; Cleric Skills; Cleric Spellcasting; Defense Trained (Unarmored Defense); Deity; Divine Font; Doctrine; General Feats; Perception Expertise; Perception Trained; Resolute Faith; Save Expert (Will); Save Trained (Fortitude; Reflex); Skill Feats; Skill Increases; Spell Trained (Divine); Warpriest Field Medic Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Constitution, Wisdom; Choose 1 from any); Battle Medicine; Skill Trained (Medicine; Warfare Lore) Human Features: Ancestry Feats; Attribute Boost (Choose 2 from any); Human Heritage; Versatile Human
Feature Notes:
Ancestry Feats: 3 selections
Cleric Feats: 5 selections
Deity: Has the Anathema and Sanctification features
Divine Font: Has the Healing Font feature
Doctrine: 1 selection
General Feats: 2 selections
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Sanctification: Has neither the Holy nor Unholy feature
Skill Feats: 5 selections
Versatile Human: +1 General Feat
Warpriest: Has the Shield Block feature
Adopted Ancestry (Tripkee): May take Tripkee ancestry feats
Anathema: May not perform acts or use spells prohibited by Gozreh
Perception: +17 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +2 (dexterity; untrained) Dwarven Lore: +14 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +3 (charisma; untrained)
Arcana: +14 (intelligence; trained) Guild Lore: +14 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +15 (wisdom; trained)
Astrology Lore: +14 (intelligence; trained) Hunting Lore: +14 (intelligence; trained) Society: +2 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +3 (strength; untrained) Intimidation: +3 (charisma; untrained) Stealth: +2 (dexterity; untrained)
Boneyard Lore: +14 (intelligence; trained) Legal Lore: +14 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +15 (wisdom; trained)
Crafting: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +15 (wisdom; trained) Thievery: +2 (dexterity; untrained)
Deception: +3 (charisma; untrained) Military Lore: +16 (intelligence; expert) Warfare Lore: +14 (intelligence; trained)
Diplomacy: +3 (charisma; untrained) Nature: +3 (wisdom; untrained)
Dragon Lore: +18 (intelligence; master) Occultism: +14 (intelligence; trained)
Languages: Common; Fey; Kelish; Varisian
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Dragon Lore): Skill Master (Dragon Lore)
Canny Acumen (Perception): Perception Expert
Cleric Skills: Skill Trained (Religion; Choose 4 from any)
Deity: Skill Trained (Survival)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Perception Expertise: Perception Expert
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 4 from any)
Skill Training (Hunting Lore): Skill Trained (Hunting Lore)
Skill Training (Military Lore): Skill Trained (Military Lore)
Assurance (Religion): Can take an automatic 22 on Religion checks
Battle Medicine: (1) Uses Medicine to restore Hit Points once per target per day
Group Aid: (F) After Aiding an ally, Aids another on the same skill
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Terrain Expertise (Arctic): +1 Survival in Arctic
Combat
Hit Points: 128 Armor Class: 27 (dexterity (1 max); trained) Class DC: Cleric: 25 (wisdom; trained)
Armor: Chain Mail Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Club (+17 1d6+3 B R10'; strength; expert); Dagger (+17 1d4+3 P/S R10'; strength; expert); Javelin (+16 1d6+3 P R30'; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Deity: Attack Trained (Trident)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Unconventional Weaponry (Hatchet): Weapon Familiarity (Hatchet)
Warpriest: Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor)/Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)/Attack Expert (Trident; Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Divine Rebuttal: (R) Successful trident Strike against an adjacent foe gives allies +2 vs. its triggering magic effect, or +3 on a critical hit
Replenishment Of War: Successful trident Strikes give self 5 temporary Hit Points, or 10 temporary Hit Points on a critical hit, until the start of the next turn
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Warpriest: Critical hits with a trident inflict its critical specialization effect
Save: Fortitude: +18 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +14 (dexterity; trained); Will: +19 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Resolute Faith: Save Master (Will)
Warpriest: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Resolute Faith: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: D1: 3; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; DC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Divine: +15 (wisdom; trained) Spell DC: Divine: 25 (wisdom; trained)
Spells:
Air Bubble (D1): (R) R60' Allows target to breathe normally in any environment for 1 min
Alarm (D1): (10 min) 20' burst triggers a mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying a specified password for 8 hr (heightened 3rd allows specifying characteristics of triggering creatures)
Anointed Ground (D3): (1 min) 30' burst gives +1 Armor Class, attacks, damage, and saves vs. aberrations, celestials, dragons, fiends, monitors, or undead until next daily prep
Augury (D2): (10 min) Reveals whether the results of a proposed action up to 30 min in the future will be generally good or bad
Avatar (D10): (2) Self becomes a Huge creature with darkvision, 30 temporary HP, Armor Class 35, +33 attack, +35 Athletics, and deity-specific features for 1 min
Bane (D1): (2) 10' emanation inflicts -1 attack on foes for 1 min (save Will negates); a concentrate action each rd increases the radius by 10'
Banishment (D5): (2) R30' Returns the target to its home plane (save Will (-2 if cast using an additional action and a target anathema) negates; critical success inflicts stunned 1 on self; critical failure prevents the target's return for 1 week) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Bind Undead (D3): (2) R30' Controls the actions of a mindless undead of level less than or equal to the spell level for 1 day
Bless (D1): (2) 15' radius gives allies +1 attack for 1 min; a concentrate action each rd increases the radius by 10'
Blessed Boundary (D6): (3) R120' 60' burst inflicts 7d8 HP force and a 10' push for 1 min (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts doubles HP and push distance) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Blinding Fury (D6): (R) R60' Makes self hidden from the triggering attacker for 1 rd after every damaging attack for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects are permanent and also affect the target's perception of other creatures)
Blindness (D3): (2) R30' Blinds the target for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent blindness)
Blistering Invective (DC1): (2) Allows self voice to be heard up to 500' away, giving +1 Coerce and auditory Perform in large venues (heightened 5th extends voice to 1200'; 7th extends voice to 1 mile)
Blood Vendetta (D2): (R) R30' Spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP persistent bleed and weakness 1 to piercing and slashing on a target that has inflicted piercing, slashing, or persistent bleed on self (save Will inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP) (heightened +2 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Breath Of Life (D5): (R) R60' Prevents the triggering target's death, restoring 5d8 HP (heightened +2 restores +1d8 HP)
Calm (D2): (2) R120' 10' burst calms creatures and prevents them from taking hostile actions while sustained for up to 1 min; a hostile action ends the spell for the target (save Will inflicts -1 attack; critical success negates; critical failure allows the effects to continue after a hostile action)
Canticle Of Everlasting Grief (D8): (2) R120' Inflicts 10d6 HP mental, frightened 3, a curse that negates of circumstance and status bonuses for 1 week (save Will inflicts half HP, frightened 1, and cursed for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, frightened 4, and permanent curse that also affects allies within 15'
Charitable Urge (D2): (2) R30' Compels the target to give a possession to the nearest creature (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 4 rd or until a successful save)
Chilling Darkness (D3): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 5d6 HP cold, plus 5d6 HP spirit on holy creatures, (double HP on a critical success) and makes a counteract attempt vs. magical light (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP cold and spirit)
Cleanse Affliction (D2): (2) Reduces the stage of a curse, disease, or poison affecting touched by 1 (heightened 3rd attempts to counteract a disease or poison; 4th attempts to counteract a curse, disease, or poison)
Cleanse Cuisine (D1): (2) R10' Enhances or removes contaminants from 1 cubic foot of food and drink (heightened +2 affects +1 cubic foot)
Clear Mind (D2): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 fleeing, frightened, or stupefied effect affecting touched (heightened 4th can counteract confused, controlled, or slows; 6th can counteract doomed; 8th can counteract stunned)
Command (D1): (2) R30' Target obeys a command to approach, run away, drop a held object, drop prone, or stand in place for 1 action (save Will negates; critical failure causes the target to use all actions on its next turn to obey) (heightened 5th affects 10 targets)
Create Food (D2): (1 hr) R30' Creates food for 6 Medium creatures that lasts for 1 day (heightened 4th creates food for 12; 6th creates food for 50; 8th creates food for 200)
Create Water (D1): (2) Creates 2 gallons of water that last for 1 day
Crisis Of Faith (D3): (2) R30' Inflicts 6d6 HP mental, or 6d8 HP mental and stupefied 1 for 1 rd on divine casters (save Will inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, stupefied 1 for 1 rd, and no divine casting for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP, or +2d8 HP on divine casters)
Darkvision (D2): (2) Allows self to see in darkness for 1 hr (heightened 3rd affects a touched target; 5th effects last until next daily prep)
Daze (DC1): (2) R60' Inflicts 1d6 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Deafness (D2): (2) R30' Inflicts deafness for 10 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent deafness)
Detect Magic (DC1): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the rank of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Detect Poison (D1): (2) R30' Reveals whether the target creature or object is venomous or poisoned (heightened 2nd reveals the number and types of poison)
Dispel Magic (D2): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to remove 1 spell effect from the target or to make a magic item inert for 10 min
Dispelling Globe (D4): (2) 10' burst attempts to counteract outside spells at the spell level - 1 for 10 min
Divine Decree (D7): (2) R40' 40' emanation inflicts 7d10 HP spirit and enfeebled 2 for 1 min on foes (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, banishment, and, for creatures of level 10 and lower, paralysis for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts death) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP and increases the level of creatures that suffer paralysis by 2)
Divine Immolation (D5): (2) R120' 20' burst inflicts 6d6 HP fire or spirit and 2d6 HP persistent fire or spirit (save Reflex inflicts half initial HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP initial and persistent) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP initial and persistent)
Divine Inspiration (D8): (2) Willing touched recovers 1 6th-level or lower spell or slot and regains Focus Points
Divine Lance (DC1): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d4+3 HP of chosen alignment, or double HP on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Divine Wrath (D4): (2) R120' 20' burst inflicts 4d10 HP spirit and sickened 1 (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2 and slowed 1) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Dominate (D6): (2) R30' Self controls the actions of the target until next daily prep; a successful save at end of each turn ends the spell (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure allows further saves only upon repugnant orders) (heightened 10th effects are permanent)
Dragon Form (D6): (2) Self becomes a Large dragon with 40' Speed, 100' fly Speed, 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +22 attack, +6 damage, a breath weapon, resistance 10 to the breath weapon damage type, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, +23 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 8th becomes a Huge creature with 120' fly Speed, +5' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 31, +28 attack, +12 damage (breath weapon +14), +28 Athletics)
Dream Message (D3): (10 min) Self sends 1 min of speech to a familiar creature, received the next time they sleep (heightened 4th sends speech to 10 familiar creatures)
Eclipse Burst (D7): (2) R500' 60' burst attempts to counteract magical light and inflicts 8d10 HP cold, plus 8d4 HP void to living creatures (save Reflex; inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP cold and +1d4 HP void)
Energy Aegis (D7): (1 min) Touched gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, vitality, void, and sonic damage until next daily prep (heightened 9th gives resistance 10)
Enfeeble (D1): (2) R30' Inflicts enfeebled 2 for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3 for 1 min)
Environmental Endurance (D2): (10 min) Protects touched from severe cold or heat until next daily prep (heightened 3rd protects from both cold and heat; 5th protects from extreme cold and heat)
Everlight (D2): (3) Touched gemstone emits 20' bright light until dismissed
Execute (D7): (2) R30' Target suffers 70 HP void, dying at 0 HP (save basic Fortitudeheightened +1 inflicts +10 HP)
Fear (D1): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Field Of Life (D6): (2) R30' 20' burst restores 1d8 HP per rd to living and inflicts 1d8 HP vitality per rd to undead while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 8th restores and inflicts 1d10 HP; 9th restores and inflicts 1d12 HP)
Forbidding Ward (DC1): (2) R30' Target gains +1 Armor Class and saves vs. a specified foe while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 Armor Class and saves)
Foresight (D9): (2) Touched gains +2 initiative and does not suffer off-guard vs. undetected and flanking creatures, and self may use a reaction to give the target the better of 2 rolls or its foe the worse of 2 rolls, for 1 hr
Gate (D10): (2) R120' Opens a 40' radius gate to another plane while sustained for up to 1 min
Guidance (DC1): (1) R30' Target gains +1 on an attack, Perception, save, or skill check within 1 rd once per target per hr
Harm (D1): (1) Touched (2 or 3 actions gives R30' or a 30' emanation) suffers 1d8 HP negative (save basic Fortitude); undead instead regain 1d8 HP, or 1d8+8 HP with 2 actions (heightened +1 restores or inflicts +1d8 HP; undead regain +8 HP with 2 actions)
Heal (D1): (1) Touched (2 or 3 actions gives R30' or a 30' emanation) regains 1d8 HP, or 1d8+8 HP with 2 actions; undead instead suffer 1d8 HP (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 restores or inflicts +1d8 HP; restores +8 HP with 2 actions)
Heroism (D3): (2) Touched gains +1 attack, Perception, saves, and skill checks for 10 min (heightened 6th gives +2 bonus; 8th gives +3 bonus)
Holy Light (D3): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 5d6 HP fire, plus 5d6 HP spirit to unholy creatures (critical success inflicts double HP), and attempts to counteract magical darkness (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP fire and spirit)
Indestructibility (D10): (2) Gives self immunity to harm for 1 rd
Infuse Vitality (D1): (1) Touched weapon (using 2 or 3 actions affects 2 or 3 weapons) inflicts +1d4 HP vitality for 1 min (heightened 3rd weapon inflicts +2d4 HP; 5th weapon inflicts +3d4 HP)
Interplanar Teleport (D7): (10 min) Transports self and 8 willing targets to an imprecise location on a different plane
Invoke Spirits (D5): (2) R120' 10' burst, movable 30' per rd, inflicts 2d4 HP mental and 2d4 HP void while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure also inflicts frightened 2, plus fleeing in the first rd) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d4 HP mental and void)
Know The Way (DC1): (2) Reveals which direction is north (heightened 3rd reveals direction to a location visited in the past week; 7th reveals direction to a familiar location)
Light (DC1): (2) R120' Orb lights a 20' radius until next daily prep (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Locate (D3): (10 min) R500' Reveals the direction to a named object or the nearest object of a named type while sustained; effects are blocked by lead and running water (heightened 5th reveals the direction to a familiar creature or ancestry)
Lock (D1): (2) Touched latch or lock opens only for self until next daily prep; a successful DC 25 Athletics or Thievery check (or lock DC + 4 if higher) ends the spell (heightened 2nd effects are permanent)
Marvelous Mount (D2): (10 min) R30' Conjures a magical mount (Armor Class 27, HP 10, 40' Speed) that can be ridden only by a designated creature for 8 hr (heightened 3rd mount can walk on water; 4th mount has 60' Speed; 5th mount can also fly for 1 rd; 6th mount has 80' Speed and can fly)
Massacre (D9): (2) 60' line inflicts 100 HP void on creatures up to level 17 and kills those reduced to 0 HP; if none die, it inflicts an additional 30 void on all within the line, including self (save Fortitude inflicts 9d6 HP; critical success negates; critical failure kills) (heightened 10th inflicts 115 HP (save Fortitude 10d6 HP) on creatures up to level 19)
Mending (D1): (10 min) Restores 5 HP per spell rank to a touched light, non-magical object (heightened 2nd can affect a 1 Bulk object; 3rd can affect a 2 Bulk or magical 1 Bulk object)
Message (DC1): (1) R120' Allows self to hold a private conversation with a visible target for 1 turn (heightened 3rd R500')
Moment Of Renewal (D8): (2) 6 touched instantly gain the effects of 24 hr of rest once per target per day
Mystic Armor (D1): (2) Self gains +1 Armor Class with a +5 maximum Dexterity modifier until next daily prep (heightened 4th also gives +1 saves; 6th gives +2 Armor Class; 8th gives +2 saves; 10th gives +3 Armor Class and saves)
Noise Blast (D2): (2) R30' 10' burst inflicts 2d10 HP sonic and deafened for 1 rd (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, deafened for 1 min, and stunned 1) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Outcast's Curse (D4): (2) Touched suffers 1 step worse initial attitudes and the worse of 2 Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance rolls until the curse is removed (save Will effects last for 10 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts initial attitudes 2 steps worse)
Overwhelming Presence (D9): (2) 40' burst inflicts fascinated and forces creatures to pay tribute once per turn for 6 turns (save Will affected must pay tribute only twice; critical success negates; critical failure causes affected to use all actions each turn to pay tribute)
Peaceful Rest (D2): (2) Touched corpse does not decay and cannot be made undead until next daily prep (heightened 5th effects are permanent)
Pest Cache (D1): (1) Moves companion into a pocket dimension for up to 8 hr
Pinpoint (D8): (10 min) Reveals the exact location of a specified familiar creature or object
Planar Seal (D7): (2) R120' 60' burst attempts to counteract any teleportation or planar travel until next daily prep
Planar Tether (D4): (2) R30' Attempts to counteract any effect that would move the target to a different plane for 10 min (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 hr)
Prestidigitation (DC1): (2) R10' Performs cooking, lifting, making a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Protection (D1): (2) Touched gains +1 Armor Class and saves for 1 min (heightened 3rd effects allies in a 10' emanation around target)
Raise Dead (D6): (10 min) R10' Restores a willing soul up to level 13 to its corpse, dead for at most 3 days, giving it 1 HP, clumsy 2, drained 2, and enfeebled 2 for 1 week (heightened 7th raises the maximum level to 15; 8th level 17; 9th level 19; 10th level 21)
Read Aura (DC1): (1 min) R30' Reveals whether an object is magical and gives +2 to Identify Magic on it (heightened 3rd affects 10 targets; 6th affects unlimited targets)
Read Omens (D4): (10 min) Reveals a clue or advice about a proposed activity up to 1 week in the future
Regenerate (D7): (2) Touched target regains 15 HP and regrows a damaged organ each rd for 1 min; suffering new acid or fire damage negates the effects for 1 rd (heightened 9th restores 20 HP each rd)
Remake (D10): (1 hr) R5' Fully re-creates a known object up to 5'x5'x5' from a remnant
Repulsion (D6): (2) Emanation up to 40' prevents creatures from approaching for 1 min (save Will inflicts difficult terrain; critical success negates)
Resist Energy (D2): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 vs. a specified energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
Revealing Light (D2): (2) R120' 10' burst dazzles makes concealed creatures visible and invisible creatures concealed for 1 min (save Reflex effects last 2 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects last 10 min)
Revival (D10): (2) 30' radius restores 10d8+40 HP to living targets and raises dead targets with the same number of temporary HP while sustained for up to 1 min
Ring Of Truth (D3): (2) R30' 20' burst prevents lies and inflicts -2 Deception for 10 min (save Will inflicts -2 Deception only; critical success negatesinflicts -4 Deception)
Runic Body (D1): (2) Touched creature's unarmed attack gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 attack; 9th gives +3 attack
Runic Weapon (D1): (2) Touched weapon gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 attack; 9th gives +3 attack
Safe Passage (D3): (3) 10'x10'x60' area gives +2 Armor Class, +2 saves, and resistance 5 to damage from the terrain and environment while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 5th gives resistance 10 and extends area to 120'; 8th gives resistance 15 and extends area to 500'
Sanctuary (D1): (2) Prevents creatures from attacking touched for 1 min (save Will each rd negates for 1 rd; critical success ends the spell; critical failure allows no further save attempts)
Scouting Eye (D5): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see from the target location and that can be moved 30' each rd while sustained
See The Unseen (D2): (2) Self treats invisible creatures and objects as concealed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 8 hr)
Seize Soul (D9): (2) R30' Traps the soul of a corpse dead for less than 1 min in a gem until counteracted or the gem is destroyed
Sending (D5): (3) Self exchanges a pair of 25-word messages with a known creature
Shadow Blast (D5): (2) 30' cone, R120' 15' burst, or 50' line inflicts 6d8 HP of a choice of damage type (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Share Life (D2): (2) R30' Transfers half of damage suffered by target to self for 10 min or until either is reduced to 0 HP
Shield (DC1): (1) Self gains +1 Armor Class for 1 rd; may end the spell and not use it again for 10 min to use Shield Block with Hardness 5 (heightened +2 gives Hardness +5)
Sigil (DC1): (2) Inscribes a 1" sq magical mark on a touched object or creature; the mark can be scrubbed off and fades from a creature after 1 week (heightened 3rd marks a creature for 1 month; 5th marks a creature for 1 year; 7th marks a creature permanently)
Silence (D2): (2) Willing touched makes no sound for 1 min (heightened 4th affects a 10' radius around touched)
Sound Body (D2): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a magical blinded, dazzled, deafness, enfeebled, or sickened effect affecting touched; failure that would succeed against an effect 2 ranks lower suppresses the effect for 1 rd (heightened 4th attempts to counteract drained; 8th attempts to counteract stunned)
Speak With Stones (D5): (2) Allows self to converse with stone for 1 hr (heightened 6th effects last 8 hr
Spellwrack (D6): (2) R30' Until the curse is removed, each time the target is affected by a spell with a duration, it suffers 2d12 HP persistent force and the duration of every spell affecting it is reduced by 1 rd (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts 4d12 HP)
Spirit Blast (D6): (2) R30' Target's spirit suffers 16d6 HP spirit (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Spirit Link (D1): (2) R30' Transfers 2 HP of damage each rd from a willing target to self for 10 min (heightened +1 transfers +2 HP)
Spiritual Armament (D2): (2) R120' Spectral weapon makes a spell attack that inflicts 2d8 HP spirit or weapon damage type each rd while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Spiritual Guardian (D5): (2) R120' Summoned guardian with 50 HP may attack or defend each rd while sustained for up to 1 min; attack inflicts 3d8 HP spirit or weapon damage type; defense absorbs 10 HP of damage from an attack on an ally (heightened +2 guardian gains +20 HP and inflicts +1d8 HP)
Stabilize (DC1): (2) R30' Removes dying condition from target
Status (D2): (2) Reveals willing touched's direction, distance, and conditions until next daily prep (heightened 4th R10' affects 10 targets)
Summon Celestial (D5): (3) R30' A level 5 celestial appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Dragon (D5): (3) R30' A level 5 dragon appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Fiend (D5): (3) R30' A level 5 fiend appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Instrument (DC1): (3) Creates a handheld musical instrument that self can play for 1 hr (Heightened 5th creates a virtuoso instrument
Summon Monitor (D5): (3) R30' A level 5 monitor appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Undead (D1): (3) R30' A level -1 undead appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Sunburst (D7): (2) R500' 60' burst attempts to counteract magical darkness and inflicts 8d10 HP fire, plus 8d10 HP vitality to undead (save Reflex inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP fire and vitality)
Sure Footing (D2): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a clumsy, grabbed, or paralysis effect affecting touched; failure that would succeed against an effect 2 ranks lower suppresses the effect for 1 rd (heightened 4th attempts to counteract immobilized or restrained; 6th attempts to counteract petrified; 8th attempts to counteract stunned)
Talking Corpse (D4): (10 min) Touched corpse truthfully answers 3 questions within 10 min (save Will allows lying or refusing to answer; critical success prevents self from resting for 24 hr; critical failure inflicts -2 on Deception checks when giving misleading answers)
Translate (D2): (2) R30' Target understands a chosen heard language for 1 hr (heightened 3rd the target can also speak the language; 4th affects 10 targets)
Truesight (D6): (2) R60' Makes counteract checks to allow self to see through illusions and transmutations for 10 min
Truespeech (D5): (2) Target understands and speaks all languages for 1 hr (heightened 7th effects last for 8 hr)
Unfettered Movement (D4): (2) Relieves touched of Speed penalty effects and gives automatic success on Escape attempts vs. non-magical effects and magical effects up to the spell level for 10 min
Vampiric Exsanguination (D6): (2) 30' cone inflicts 12d6 HP void, giving self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half that suffered by the most-affected target (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Vampiric Feast (D3): (2) Touch inflicts 6d6 HP void, giving self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half the inflicted damage (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Ventriloquism (D1): (2) Allows self to project their voice up to 60' for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects last for 1 hr, allow changing voice quality, and require an active Perception to attempt to disbelieve)
Vibrant Thorns (D1 Foc): (1) Unarmed and adjacent melee attacks on self inflict 1 HP piercing on the attacker for 1 min; casting a vitality spell increases the damage to 1d6 HP for 1 turn (heightened +1 inflicts +1 HP, or +1d6 HP after casting a vitality spell)
Vital Beacon (D4): (1 min) Touch heals once each rd: 4d10 HP, 4d8 HP, 4d6 HP, then 4d4 HP, until expended or next daily prep (heightened +1 each touch restores +1 die)
Vitality Lash (DC1): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d6 HP positive on an undead target (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Void Warp (DC1): (2) Touch inflicts 2d4 HP negative on a living creature (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Wails Of The Damned (D9): (2) 40' emanation inflicts 8d10 HP void and drained 1d4 (save Fortitude inflicts HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and drained 4)
Water Breathing (D2): (1 min) R30' 5 targets can breathe water for 1 hr (heightened 3rd effects last for 8 hr; 4th effects last until next daily prep)
Water Walk (D2): (2) Touched can walk on liquids for 10 min (heightened 4th R30' affects 10 creatures, and effects last for 1 hr)
Zealous Conviction (D6): (2) R30' 10 willing targets gain 12 temporary HP, gain +2 Will vs. mental effects, and must comply with self requests for 10 min (save Will after fulfilling a repugnant request ends the spell) (heightened 9th gives 18 temporary HP and +3 Will)
Magic Notes:
Domain Initiate (Nature): Knows the Vibrant Thorns divine spell/Has a focus pool
Warpriest: Spell Trained (Divine)
Cleric Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Cremate Undead: Heal cast upon undead also inflicts persistent fire damage equal to the spell rank
Deity: Has access to Gust Of Wind, Lightning Bolt, and Control Water spells
Healing Font: Can cast Heal at rank 5 an additional 5 times per day
Martyr: (1) Subsequent healing spell also transfers 1d8 HP per spell rank from self to target
